name: Mr. Tavern Guy
description:
Play as a tavern keeper who sends his patrons on quests in order to gain enough money to pay for his tavern by the end of the week. The king sends you a message that gives you all the information you need to craft the right team for the job.

This was an attempt for the GMTK 2021 game jam, unfortunately we did not finish in time. "Join together" a team of adventurers to go on a quest.

Everything that you don't like about the game was Liam's idea.
